text: is a Japanese football club which played in Japan Soccer League. ==Club name== *1946-2000; Toyoda Automatic Loom Works SC *2001-present; Toyota Industries SC ==League position== *1965 : JSL Division 1 - 6th *1966 : JSL Division 1 - 6th *1967 : JSL Division 1 - 8th *1972 : JSL Division 2 - 10th *1973 : JSL Division 2 - 9th Category:1940s establishments in Japan Category:1946 establishments in Asia Category:Football clubs in Aichi Prefecture Category:Toyota
